post.author: na
post.content:
Yes, I am thinking of referral fee.
*******************************

At this time, my client is looking for someone with SharePoint 2007 Development, however because this is a new technology, the requirements of this position might change. If so, I will connect with you as you have some great experiences. I will also keep you in mind, should we have another position come available, I will connect with you directly.

Do you know anyone with SharePoint 2007 experience? We offer referral fees for successful placements.

Thanks so much for your interest,

Jenn Metzloff
Recruiter
PROCOM, Waterloo
jennm@procom.ca
Ph: (519) 885-4331 ext. 202
Fax: (519) 885-5308

PROCOM - "Bringing People & Technology Together"
post.title: Kitchener-Waterloo‏ (SharePoint 2007), anyone?
